```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(1234)

source("Generator2.R")
```


```{r}
# define number of diff signals
n_s.1 = 3
n_s.2 = c(2,2,2)
p = 19 # total parameter size
n_s.3 = sum(n_s.2)
n = 20 #sample size
n_exp = 1 # itertation times


# get a vector of strong signal
vec_s.1 = c()
for (i in 1:n_s.1){
  vec_s.1 = rbind(vec_s.1,paste("x",i,sep = ""))
}
vec_s.1 = c(vec_s.1)

# get the threshold

thre = sqrt(log(p)/n)

# get y 

beta = rep(c(20,0.5,0.5,0,1),c(n_s.1,sum(n_s.2),n_s.3,p-n_s.1-sum(n_s.2)-n_s.3,1))

# col names
col_name = c()
for (i in 1:p){
  col_name = rbind(col_name,paste0("x",i))
}
col_name = rbind(col_name,"y")
```



```{r}
# AIC selection procedure

prop_s.1_selected = numeric(n_exp)

for (i in 1:n_exp)
{
  data = Gen_Method2(n_s.1,n_s.2,n_s.3,P=p,N=n)
  
# get y 
y =  data %*% as.matrix(beta)

# generate dataset for regression 
df = 
  as_tibble(data[,-(p+1)]) %>% 
  mutate(y = y) %>% 
  setNames(col_name) 
  
  fit.forward = step(object = lm(y ~ 1, data = df),
                      scope = formula(lm(y ~ ., data = df)), 
                      direction = "forward", k = 2, trace = 2) 
  
 selected <- attr(x = fit.forward$terms, which = "variables")
 
 n_s.1_selected = sum(as.character(selected) %in% vec_s.1)
 prop_s.1_selected[[i]] = n_s.1_selected/n_s.1
}

avg_prop_s.1_selected = mean(prop_s.1_selected)
avg_prop_s.1_selected
```
